data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Argeș who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Argeș, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Argeș, Romania to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Argeș, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Argeș to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Argeș, Romania to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Argeș.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 502,125 people in the state of Argeș who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
